Name: PagerDuty - Close Maintenance Window
Description: Closes a maintenance window by Id.
Author: nskerl

Parameters.Name: Subdomain
Parameters.Label: Subdomain
Parameters.HelpText:
The subdomain of the PagerDuty instance.

Found here: https://**mydomain**.pagerduty.com/

Parameters.Name: Token
Parameters.Label: Token
Parameters.HelpText:
The API token of the PagerDuty instance.

Found here: https://mydomain.pagerduty.com/api_keys

Parameters.Name: OpeningStepName
Parameters.Label: OpeningStepName
Parameters.HelpText: The **previous** step in which the window to close was opened.
